message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can adjust later if you're not happy.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor.  How about a 55/45 split? The value of the deal decreases for both of us each round we wait.
Let's call it even. A 50/50 split seems like the most reasonable given the inflation.  We both get the same value, and we can move on.
